Description:
Art Deco charm in a prized pocket.
Enriched with an abundance of Art Deco originality, this enchanting three bedroom clinker brick residence, built circa 1939, has been in the same family for 80 years. In this prized locale this home features a charming façade, leadlight aspects, decorative high ceilings, picture rails and polished hardwood floors typical of its era. Set amidst private gardens, a classic floor plan reveals elegant entry hall and formal fireside lounge and separate dining room connected by exquisite leadlight French doors. The kitchen comes complete with an inbuilt dining booth and classic cabinetry, three bedrooms are served by a traditional bathroom, ducted heating, hallway storage, sunroom, laundry/toilet, carport and garage complete the picture. Zoned for Strathmore College and just a short walk from Glenbervie station, buses, trams, Essendon Primary, PEGS, local cafes, shops and quick access to CityLink.
